attr.title: Toziuha Night: Dracula's Revenge
attr.desc: Toziuha Night Dracula's Revenge is a 2D side-scrolling action platformer with classicvania style. Travel through different linear maps set in a dark fantasy world; such as a gloomy forest and Count Dracula's castle. Play as Xandria, a beautiful and skilled alchemist who, using an iron whip, fights against the most fearsome demons and other alchemists. Find out more about this tragic story of a girl who fights with a whip of iron chains, a cruel reminder of a tragic past.
attr.inst:
Purchase the game on Itch.io https://dannygaray60.itch.io/toziuha-night-draculas-revenge, download the linux version and extract the toziuha.pck into the gamedata folder. 
Alternatively you can also buy it on Steam, both Windows and Linux version are compatible. Install the game and copy the toziuha_night_dracula's_revenge.pck into the gamedata folder.
